name: Brick Blocks
description:
In Brick Blocks the goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this puzzle game.
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids.
You can play games for FREE!

HOW TO PLAY
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
• Blocks can be rotated.
• No time limits!
Swipe left or right to move the block
Tap on the screen to rotate block

FEATURES
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Various Blocks
• Hours of fun, exciting play
